Class Availability

java.lang.Object
com.group6.hms.app.managers.availability.models.Availability
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventInterface, Serializable
public class Availability extends Object implements EventInterface, Serializable
The Availability class represents a doctor's available appointment slot, including the date and start and end times. It implements EventInterface for calendar integration and Serializable for storage.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Availability

      public Availability(Doctor doctor, LocalDate availableDate, AvailabilityStatus availabilityStatus, LocalTime startTime, LocalTime endTime)
      Constructs a new Availability instance with the specified doctor, available date, start time, and end time.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor associated with this availability
      availableDate - the date when the doctor is available
      availabilityStatus - the availability's status either Available or Booked
      startTime - the start time of availability
      endTime - the end time of availability

      public UUID getAvailabilityId()

    • setAvailabilityStatus

      public void setAvailabilityStatus(AvailabilityStatus availabilityStatus)
      This method is used by the AvailabilityManager to modify the AvailabilityStatus. Instead, use AvailabilityManager.updateAvailability(Availability, AvailabilityStatus)to change the AvailabilityStatus
